edu.pwr.tp.server

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.pwr.tp.server.GameManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CCManager

    public abstract class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class managing a GameModel, a link between the server and a model

      protected GameModel model
      The model managed by this manager
